channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump issues two pardons related to Jan. 6 investigation
item.description: President Donald Trump has issued two pardons related to the investigation into the Jan. 6, 2021 riot, including for a woman convicted of threatening ...

item.title: What’s More Dangerous than India’s Frequent Heat Waves? Heat Stress.
item.description: Women who face long-term heat exposure in workplaces and homes are finding it takes a heavy toll on their health and income.

item.title: 4 Dead After Suspected Migrant Boat Overturns Near a San Diego Area Beach
item.description: The boat capsized off the coast, officials said. Four people were taken to a hospital and one person was taken into custody.

item.title: Storm Pounds Southern California With Heavy Rains and Some Flooding
item.description: Evacuation orders were lifted in Los Angeles County after an unusually powerful storm brought heavy rain and prompted concerns about mudslides. At lea...

item.title: How Many People Die in India From Hot Weather? Nobody Really Knows.
item.description: Officials have yet to grasp the magnitude of heat-related deaths, let alone effectively deal with the problem, public health experts and scientists sa...

item.title: U.S. Border Patrol Launches Operation in Charlotte, N.C.
item.description: It is unclear how long the operation will last in North Carolina’s largest city, which has a growing immigrant population.

item.description: Members of Mexico’s Gen Z, as well as older protesters, demonstrated on Saturday in the wake of a high-profile assassination and rising anger over per...

item.title: A red meat allergy caused by ticks killed a N.J. man. Here's what to know
item.description: Researchers say they believe they've documented the first known death from alpha-gal syndrome — a red meat allergy caused by tick bites.

item.title: Americana troubadour Todd Snider, alt-country singer-songwriter, dies at 59
item.description: Known for his cosmic-stoner songwriting and freewheeling tunes, Todd Snider's career spanned three decades.

item.title: Disability rights activist and author Alice Wong dies at 51

item.title: Vatican to Return Indigenous Cultural Items to Canada Taken a Century Ago
item.description: Dozen of pieces used in a 1925 exhibition, including a whale-hunting kayak, will be returned to Canada early next month.

item.title: A Challenge to Canada’s Official Policy That the U.S. Is Safe for Migrants
item.description: A former Liberal immigration minister said that Canada should drop an agreement that allows it to return asylum seekers who enter from the U.S.
